channel.title: Java errors
channel.description:
i get this error when i choose "runserver" i have done java ev setter and it still will not run it. If anyone knows how to fix this problem please PM me.
This is the error ---------------------------------------------------------------------
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: net/com/espeon/Server
Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: net.com.espeon.Server at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: net/com/espeon/Server. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

item.title: Java errors
item.dc:creator: @donkader donkader
item.description:
@donkader wrote:

Nevermind i fixed it i got it running great i just had to edit the environment variables a little bit. But thanks

Read full topic

Is server.java there or server.class

i have the location correct i checked it it is the right folder along with the right path.

item.title: Java errors
item.dc:creator: @Setsuna Setsuna
item.description:
@Setsuna wrote:

Make sure the path it’s searching for the server in is correct.

“net/com/espeon/Server”

Net folder -> Com folder -> espeon folder -> Server

Read full topic

i get this error when i choose “runserver”
i have done java ev setter and it still will not run it. If anyone knows how to fix this problem please PM me.
